review: I experienced HDMI video issues right out of the box, which requires some fiddling. Software works half the time. Interface freezes way too often. I get booted out of my apps, which I presume means the app has crashed. Very disappointed with this poorly performing Amazon product. I'll have to wait for some sort of software update and hope it gets better. As a point of reference, I also have a 1st Gen Sony Google TV and it is way more responsive... I originally thought this was going to be an upgrade to the GTV, I was WRONG!! Amazon needs to fix this mess.
